author: brian
msg: PR:
This can cause conceptual problems with folks trying to use this the
right way; by exhorting them to find a mirror site both at the top of
index.html and in dist/, I think we're doing our duty adequately.
Brian

author: brian
msg: PR:
No longer require CGI to be running on various mirrors, but it really
is necessary to use server-side includes for headers and footers.

author: pcs
msg: Force rebuild if ./Configure is run again. Files in core and modules/*
now depend on their local Makefile, so if it is updated they will be
rebuilt.
